meta.description: Sami Hanine's full-stack developer portfolio showcases his expertise in web development, including responsive design, backend development, and database management.

about.title: üßë‚Äçüíª My Career So Far
about.description: For two years, I worked as a freelance developer and collaborated with several startups, including Senzu , where I worked for five months. Currently, I'm working at Miloguide rism company in Montr√©al, and I'm excited to be part of a dynamic and evolving team. If you're looking for a skilled and creative web developer, please don't hesitate to contact me. I'm confident that I can help you achieve your goals and bring your vision to life.
about.thanks: Thanks for taking the time to read a little about me!

projects.title: üíº Some of my best work
projects.obeo: Obeo Biogas is a project I did as a freelancer in Canada. It is the website of a startup affiliated to Centech (a startup accelerator in Montreal). The startup aims to reduce the ecological impact of farms while increasing their income.
projects.aled: ALED is a platform for students. It allows the users to exchange documents and ask questions in a forum. It also gives the possibility to consult one's timetable, one's grades and to discuss with other students.
projects.cabinetlatif: This is a showcase site that I created for an accounting firm based in Nantes, Cabinet Latif. I created the visuals and the code based on the client's feedback.
projects.tutoriels: I created these tutorials with the aim of helping fellow students learn Javascript. Recently, I also wrote a tutorial on React.js. In the future, I plan to cover PHP and SQL.
projects.practice: I designed this site as part of a tender for a human resources company: Practice. The challenge was to meet the specifications in terms of visuals.
projects.miloguide: I was a proud contributor to the Miloguide platform, where I integrated multiple pages from Figma designs. I worked extensively within a complex ecosystem of a multi-platform application.
projects.docshare: I developed a document sharing application for the consulting firm Emergence Entreprise. It allows customers to consult, download and send documents. The challenge of this application was related to data security.
projects.senzu: Senzu Printer is a web application that allows printing of shipping labels for connected products. It is created using Electron and React, and is designed for use by printing partners of the company.
projects.game: I've made more than a dozen video games directly integrated in the browser. Red Dimension is my biggest javascript game project to date. I loved the creative process that came out of this project

quote.text-1: There are more possible games of chess than there are atoms in the universe.
quote.text-2: It means that if you make a mistake, there‚Äôs a nearly infinite amount of ways to fix it.
